embedded_feature_html:

European and national legal regulations (only available in German)

Convention on the conservation of European wildlife and natural habitats
FCouncil Directive 92/43/EEC of 21 May 1992 on the conservation of natural habitats and of wild fauna and flora (FFH-Directive)
Directive 2009/147/EC of the European Parliament and of the Council of 30 November 2009 on the conservation of wild birds
Federal Nature Conservation Act (BNatSchG)
Federal Species Protection Ordinance (BArtSchV)
Plant Protection Act (PflSchG)
Federal Hunting Act (BJagdG)

Further laws (only available in German)

Federal Forest Act (BWaldG)
Seed Regulation (SaatV)
Plant Variety Protection Act (SortSchG)
Animal Diseases Act (TierGesG)
Animal Welfare Act (TierSchG)
national_indicators_available:
• a) National legislation and policy relevant to IAS
  • b) Align the NBSAP targets with Aichi Target 9 of the Strategic Plan for Biodiversity
comparison_sdg: The time series "a) National legislation and policy relevant to IAS" is compliant with the UN metadata. The time series "b) Align the NBSAP targets with Aichi Target 9 of the Strategic Plan for Biodiversity" is partly compliant with the UN metadata.
indicator_name: Proportion of countries adopting relevant national legislation and adequately resourcing the prevention or control of invasive alien species
target_name: By 2020, introduce measures to prevent the introduction and significantly reduce the impact of invasive alien species on land and water ecosystems and control or eradicate the priority species
un_designated_tier_url_alert: der Statistischen Division der Vereinten Nationen
un_custodian_agency: International Union for Conservation of Nature (IUCN)
goal_meta_link_alert: the Statistical Devision of the UN
source_organisation_1: Federal Ministry for the Environment, Nature Conservation, Nuclear Safety and Consumer Protection
source_url_text_1: First action plan on invasive species  (only available in German)
source_url_alert_1: the Federal Ministry for the Environment, Nature Conservation, Nuclear Safety and Consumer Protection
source_organisation_2: Federal Agency for Nature Conservation
source_url_text_2: German National Strategy on Biodiversity (only available in German)
source_url_alert_2: the Federal Agency for Nature Conservation

data_start_values.value: a) National legislation and policy relevant to IAS

footer_fields.series: a) National legislation and policy relevant to IAS
footer_fields.label: Notes
footer_fields.value:
• 1 = Yes; 0 = No und . = Unknown.
• IAS: Invasive Alien Species.
• Information on the relevant legislation can be found under the "Further information" tab.

footer_fields.series: b) Align the NBSAP targets with Aichi Target 9 of the Strategic Plan for Biodiversity
footer_fields.label: Notes
footer_fields.value:
• 1 = Yes; 0 = No und . = Unknown.
• NBSAP: National Biodiversity Strategy and Action Plan.
